title: Negative externality impact on equilibrium Q

content.question: If the production of a good generates a negative externality, which of the following is true at the private market equilibrium?

choices.label: The private market equilibrium quantity is greater than the socially optimal quantity.
The private market equilibrium quantity is equal to the socially optimal quantity.
The marginal private cost is greater than the marginal social cost.
The marginal social benefit is greater than the marginal social cost.
The price of the product equals the marginal social cost.

content.answer: The private market equilibrium quantity is greater than the socially optimal quantity.

unit.text: 6: Market Failure and the Role of Government

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Using economic concepts, principles, or models, explain how a specific economic outcome occurs, or what action should be taken in order to achieve a specific economic outcome.
